Our publications should be printed in other languages, 
                                                                           205
that foreign nations may be reached. [WHEN THESE WORDS WERE PENNED, IN 1871, ONLY A BEGINNING HAD BEEN MADE IN THE PREPARATION AND PUBLICATION OF DENOMINATIONAL LITERATURE IN THE VARIOUS LANGUAGES OF EUROPE AND OF OTHER LANDS.] Much can be done through the medium of the press, but still more can be accomplished if the influence of the labors of the living preachers goes with our publications. Missionaries are needed to go to our nations to preach the truth in a guarded, careful manner. The cause of present truth can be greatly extended by personal effort.
